title: 98/346/EC: Commission Decision of 19 May 1998 amending Decision 97/569/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of meat products (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 May 1998 amending Decision 97/569/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of meat products (Text with EEA relevance) (98/346/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex I of Decision 97/569/EC is amended as follows:
(a) after point 5 of the legend the following text is added:
'PMP= poultry meat products
RMP= rabbit meat products
FMP= farmed game meat products
WMP= wild game meat products`;
(b) the Annex to this Decision is added to Annex I.
This Decision shall apply from 10 May 1998.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 May 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 17.
(2) OJ L 13, 16. 1. 1997, p. 33.
(3) OJ L 234, 26. 8. 1997, p. 16.
(4) OJ L 82, 19. 3. 1998, p. 47.
